questions.instructions: Complete the phrases with the correct verb.

qa_pairs.item:
¹__________ cold water in the summer
²__________ sunscreen at the beach
³__________ home on a rainy day
⁴__________ to the mountains in winter
⁵__________ a photo of the snow
⁶__________ wet in the rain
qa_pairs.answer: ¹drink, ²use, ³stay, ⁴go, ⁵take, ⁶get
